name: Assisted
description: An assisted exercise machine provides support to the user during the exercise, allowing them to perform the movement with less resistance.

name: Band
description: A band is a long, thin piece of elastic material that can be used for resistance training.

name: Barbell
description: A barbell is a long bar with weight plates attached to either end, used for weight training.

name: Body Weight
description: Body-weight exercises use the weight of the individual's own body as resistance, rather than using external weights or machines.

name: Dumbbell
description: Dumbbells are small, handheld weights that can be used for various exercises.

name: Kettle-bell
description: A kettle-bell is a cast iron weight shaped like a ball with a handle, used for exercises that combine cardiovascular, strength, and flexibility training.

name: Machine
description: A machine is a piece of equipment designed to allow the user to perform one or more specific exercises, typically with adjustable resistance.

name: None
description: None refers to exercises that do not require any equipment.

name: Stretch
description: Stretch exercises involve using the body's flexibility to improve range of motion and reduce muscle tension.

name: Weighted
description: Weighted exercises involve using external weights, such as dumbbells or a barbell, to increase the resistance of the exercise.
